movesets.name: Belly Drum

items.name: Sitrus Berry
items.description: Restores 1/4 of the max HP when at 1/2 HP or less. One-time use.

movesets.description:
Moves

After a Belly Drum, Linoone's Attack skyrockets to an astounding 1048! Extreme Speed is the best STAB move on Linoone, as it is being able to pick off revenge killers such as Fletchinder and non-Focus Sash Dugtrio. Shadow Claw is also a very handy move for Linoone, as not only does it allow Linoone to have nearly unresisted coverage in conjunction with Extreme Speed, but it also allows Linoone to hit the Ghost-types that Linoone otherwise would be completely stopped by. Seed Bomb is used for hitting Rock-types such as Rhyperior.

Set Details

An Adamant nature is used to ensure that Linoone hits as hard as possible. The EV spread allows Linoone to outspeed Adamant Kabutops and OHKO it with Seed Bomb while the rest of the EVs are dumped into HP and Attack. Sitrus Berry is very handy, as it allows Linoone to instantly recover after using Belly Drum. Linoone's ability is really not important as both Gluttony and Pickup are rather useless. Quick Feet would be useful, but it is incompatible with Extreme Speed.

Usage Tips

Steel-types should always be either disposed of or heavily weakened, as they hinder Linoone's ability to sweep late-game. Setting up a Belly Drum is sometimes very hard to do, but with the right support, it is rather easy to clean late-game.

Team Options

Uxie stands out as the best teammate for Linoone, because as it has access to dual screens, Memento, and Stealth Rock, allowing Linoone to net easier KOs. Magneton and Dugtrio can trap Steel-types other than Doublade that Linoone absolutely despises. In addition, Dugtrio can also provide Memento support. Meowstic-M can set up dual screens for Linoone, allowing for a cleaner sweep. Dedicated users of Memento such as Whimsicott are very helpful because they allow Linoone to set up to Belly Drum without taking much damage.

movesets.name: Belly Drum

items.name: Sitrus Berry
items.description: Restores 1/4 of the max HP when at 1/2 HP or less. One-time use.

movesets.description:
Moves

Belly Drum boosts Linoone's Attack by six stages, allowing it to hit 1048 Attack. Extreme Speed is a strong Normal-type STAB move that also has +2 priority. Shadow Claw is used to hit Ghost-types which are immune to Extreme Speed, such as Mismagius, Spiritomb, Rotom, Golurk, and Gourgeist. Seed Bomb is used to OHKO threats such as Seismitoad, Rhydon, and Lanturn.

Set Details

252 Attack EVs are used to maximize Linoone's sweeping potential, with the remaining EVs put in HP, Defense, and Special Defense to bolster Linoone's mixed bulk. Adamant is the preferred nature as it provides the most power. Sitrus Berry is used to recover 25% of Linoone's HP after using Belly Drum. Pickup allows Linoone to get a new item if the opponent has used it, and is the preferred ability since Gluttony is mostly useless.

Usage Tips

Linoone works really well as a late-game cleaner. However, Linoone often has trouble breaking through Steel- and Rock-types such as Steelix, Klinklang, Pawniard, Ferroseed, and Probopass. After a Belly Drum, Linoone is extremely powerful, and will almost always go first thanks to its +2 priority STAB move in Extreme Speed. However, Linoone will often end up being outpaced when using its coverage moves. Physically bulkier Pokemon such as Gurdurr, Tangela, and Spiritomb can take a hit and KO Linoone back. It is therefore strongly recommended that you weaken these threats before attempting a sweep. However, it can often be hard for Linoone to set up Belly Drum due to its underwhelming bulk, but it is certainly possible with the right support, such as Memento and dual screens. There are however a few Pokemon it can set up on, such as Audino and -2 Dragalge. Linoone can also take advantage of Ghost-types using Choice Scarf, such as Rotom and Haunter, locked into Shadow Ball.

Team Options

Due to Linoone's frailty, dual screens and Memento support are greatly appreciated so that it can set up Belly Drum more easily. Uxie is a great teammate, having access to dual screens as well as Memento. Entry hazard setters are strongly recommended, giving Linoone KOs on Pokemon such as defensive Slurpuff, certain Spiritomb sets, Musharna, Vileplume, and Granbull, as well as breaking Sturdy. Good hazard setters include Omastar, Crustle, Qwilfish, Accelgor, and Ferroseed. Meowstic-M, Xatu, and Serperior are also good teammates thanks to their ability to set up dual screens. Teammates that can deal with Steel-types such as Sawk, Pyroar, Typhlosion, and Gurdurr are also appreciated. Ursaring is also a good teammate for Linoone thanks to its ability to lure in one of its best counters, Spiritomb, and OHKOing it with +2 Play Rough while dealing with most Pokemon that wall Linoone with Close Combat.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: Targets of the opposite gender are infatuated and have a 50% chance to do nothing.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. Priority +1.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.description: User loses 50% of max HP. Maximizes Attack.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: User passes its held item to the target.

moves.description: 10% chance to freeze.

moves.description: 30% chance to paralyze.

moves.description: 30% chance to poison.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Consumes pinch Berries at 50% HP or less.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If the wielder has no held item, it gets the last item consumed at the end of the turn. Adds a chance of finding an item after each battle.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: Increases Speed by 50% when afflicted with a status condition.
